name: Senior Java Developer (System Engineer/ remote OR relocate)
description:
About company:

We are the startup with HQ in Cupertino, USA and with the high-qualified international team.

We are proud to be recognized as a Leader in iPaaS solutions (by Gartner, 2020) and to be amongst the TOP 100 fastest-growing technology companies in USA (by Deloitte, 2020).

Also we are in the TOP 20 fast-growing companies in Silicon Valley, USA and in the TOP 100 Cloud companies (by Forbes, 2021).

About Product:

We develop an Integration Platform as a Service (iPaaS), a single AI-based platform that enables to integrate 300+ apps (such as Salesforce, Amazon apps, Slack etc.), unify and automate workflows, data and team interaction across these applications with robust security and governance.

What you will be responsible for:

  • Optimization and scaling system architecture
  • System, platform and low-level tasks
  • Developing drivers and connectors
  • Providing high availability and system performance during accessing different client services and databases
  • Ensuring transfer of large amounts of data and load balancing
  • Zero-downtime deployment
  • Providing network traffic control, routing control, security and data encryption
  • Solving security issues with clients
  • Providing code reviews to teammates

We expect that you have:

  • 7+ years in Java development
  • Deep knowledge of Java internals (incl. Java Core and JDBC)
  • Experience in developing multithreaded applications in Java
  • Experience working with asynchronous I/O
  • Experience working with database (SQL mostly, NoSQL, incl. cloud ones)
  • Experience working with production infrastructure
  • Experience working with high-load and high-performance systems
  • Knowledge of data structures and algorithms
  • Knowledge of network protocols
  • English level: Upper-Intermediate+ (B2)

Would be a plus:

  • Experience in low-level development (C/C++)
  • Experience with Spring
  • Experience working in startups
  • Contributions to open source projects
  • Ability to switch quickly to another language if necessary

What we offer:

  • $6000 - $8000 + Stock Option (the higher salary may be negotiated depends on your experience)
  • Full remote work
  • Relocate to Barcelona, Spain (if you want)
  • Paid cost for notebook/PC for work
  • Paid wellness and fitness
  • Paid team bonding activities and team celebrations
  • Paid cost for professional development courses, conferences and continuous learning
  • Paid 20 workdays vacation
  • Day offs according to Russian calendar
  • Collaborate with senior developer's team from the world-famous IT-companies
  • Work with speed and flexibility as a startup but with solid background of company's and product's recognition by the world famous investment fonds and by 7000+ enterprise customers world wide.
